settings.heading: We're so proud to announce that we are the Grand Prize Winner of Pharrell Williams' Black Ambition HBCU Prize!

settings.text:
​A Note From Our Founder, Kadidja Dosso:
The Black Ambition HBCU Grand Prize means the absolute world to me because it shows that our team's labor of love for the past 3 years has truly made a global impact. This opportunity would have not been made possible without your support, incredible feedback and spreading the word about Dosso Beauty. This opportunity is meant to inspire others to chase their dreams no matter what obstacles they face. Winning the Black Ambition Grand Prize is about showing our community that it is possible to dream big, work hard and your dream will be realized. ​Look forward to new products, faster shipping/delivery options, more engagement and an even better customer experience. I want to personally thank you from the bottom of my heart for helping me to turn my lifelong dream into a reality! This is truly a dream come true and we are honored to share this amazing journey with you.

custom_css: .rich-text .button.button--primary {background: #849517; color: #fff; padding: 13px 38px; display: flex; text-decoration: none; font-size: 15px; border-radius: 10px; margin: 20px 0 0; justify-content: space-between; font-family: Poppins;}

settings.text: From June 10th to July 10th Dosso Beauty partnered with Marsh + Mane, a local Black-owned Beauty supply retailer in Philly. During this month-long installment, customers were able to purchase our Hypoallergenic Braiding hair, Hair Products, Kids Hair Care & Eco-friendly Beauty Tools in store. In addition to making our products available to our local Philly customers, we held an in person Beauty Hour and a Box Braid Workshop Class.

settings.heading: We're so proud to announce that we are the Grand Prize Winner of Pharrell Williams' Black Ambition HBCU Prize!

settings.text:
​A Note From Our Founder, Kadidja Dosso:
The Black Ambition HBCU Grand Prize means the absolute world to me because it shows that our team's labor of love for the past 3 years has truly made a global impact. This opportunity is meant to inspire others to chase their dreams no matter what obstacles they face. Winning the Black Ambition Grand Prize is about showing our community that it is possible to dream big, work hard and your dream will be realized. ​Look forward to new products, faster shipping/delivery options, more engagement and an even better customer experience. settings.title: Black Business Accelerator Program
settings.text:
April 2021

Dosso Beauty has the oppopportunity to be apart of this program to grow the business by recieving access to financial support, strategic business guidance and mentorship, and marketing and promotional support.

settings.title: Black Ambition
settings.text:
May 2021

Our partnership with Black Ambition Prize is one that has no end date. This accelerator program and funding opportunity changed the trajectory for Dosso Beauty’s success. Founded by Pharrell Williams and operated by the incomparable Felecia Hatcher, they provided fundamental components to help small Black & LatinX businesses expand their network, perfect their pitch, mentorship from trailblazers within their industry and provide access to capital.

settings.title: Go Puff Put Me On
settings.text:
February 2022

Dosso Beauty had the opportunity to be apart of a 6 month program that help raise awareness of their respective brands through Gopuff's platform while providing us with impactful tools and resources to help support and grow our businesses.

settings.title: Buy Small Program
settings.text:
March 2022

During Women’s History Month, Fuse TV provided Dosso Beauty with the opportunity to air two 30-second commercials on their network for FREE! This opportunity is an initiative that the network provides called the Buy Small Program. 4 months later and our commercials are still streaming across Fuse Media’s US networks!

settings.title: In Store PopUp
settings.text:
June 2022

From June 10th to July 10th Dosso Beauty partnered with Marsh + Mane, a local Black-owned Beauty supply retailer in Philly. During this month-long installment, customers were able to purchase our Hypoallergenic Braiding hair, Hair Products, Kids Hair Care & Eco-friendly Beauty Tools in store. In addition to making our products available to our local Philly customers, we held an in person Beauty Hour and a Box Braid Workshop Class.
